sn55.32:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.32:1.4: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.32:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṁ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṁvibhāgarato.
sn55.32:3.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā sukhassāhārā”ti.
